name: Orb Orbs Planets
description:
Game was made for Godot Wild Jam #46 with theme "Orb"

You play as ORB which needs to ORB around planets, while followed by giant enemy ORBS. Goal is to orb around ten planets and don't get killed.

Planets and orbs are procedural: color, size, for planets also orientation and spin

For a (little bit more) detailed description please refer to games "instructions" and "about" sections.

CONTROLS:

- W / S / A / D: Move forward, back, left and right

- E / Q    or    LMB / RMB: Move up and down

- Shift: Speed boost (when it's ready)

CREDITS:

Music: Draft Monk – ambience by McFunkypants

Used shader for orbs
